name: emergency-news-addon
description: A browser extension that links terms on pages you visit with official sources.

scripts.copy: cp node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.js src/dependencies/popper.js ; cp node_modules/tippy.js/dist/tippy-bundle.umd.js src/dependencies/tippy-bundle.umd.js ; cp node_modules/tippy.js/themes/light.css src/dependencies/light.css
scripts.build: npm i ; npm run clean ; npm run copy ; npm run web-ext-build
scripts.build-chrome: npm run pre-build-chrome ; npm run build ; npm run pre-build-firefox
scripts.pre-build-chrome: cp node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.js src/dependencies/browser-polyfill.js ; rm -rf src/manifest.json ; cp manifest_chrome.json src/manifest.json
scripts.pre-build-firefox: rm -rf src/dependencies/browser-polyfill.js ; rm -rf src/manifest.json ; cp manifest_firefox.json src/manifest.json
scripts.firefox: npm run pre-build-firefox ; node_modules/web-ext/bin/web-ext run --pref browser.ctrlTab.recentlyUsedOrder=false --url https://bit.ly/2QaGkuj --url https://bit.ly/2vqXa0Q --url https://bit.ly/2WfDV5t --url about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox -s src
scripts.chrome: npm run pre-build-chrome ; node_modules/web-ext/bin/web-ext run -t chromium --url https://bit.ly/2QaGkuj --url https://bit.ly/2vqXa0Q --url https://bit.ly/2WfDV5t -s src
scripts.android: npm run pre-build-firefox ; node_modules/web-ext/bin/web-ext run --android-device=b0254ffd -t firefox-android --firefox-apk org.mozilla.firefox -s src
